landing.subtitle: The ultimate solution for Excel Developers and Info-product Creators. Block VBE editor access, prevent macro copying, and distribute your spreadsheets with total security. No installations, directly in the browser.
landing.localProcessing: 100% local processing. Your code never leaves your computer.
landing.featuresHeading: Transform your .xlsm file into a Black Box
landing.featuresSubtitle: Proprietary technology that blocks VBE without breaking your macros.
landing.featureVBEDesc: The code editor becomes inaccessible to the end user. No turning back, no workarounds.
landing.featureFrictionlessDesc: The client doesn't need to install anything. The file remains a standard Excel, not a suspicious .exe.
landing.featurePrivacyDesc: Our technology runs in your browser. We don't upload your file to the cloud.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to protect your VBA code?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Start now and protect your Excel files against malicious macros.

problems.problem1: Native Excel passwords are cracked in seconds.
problems.problem2: Curious clients can "break" your complex formulas by trying to edit.
problems.problem3: Competitors can steal your logic and resell your product cheaper.
problems.warning: Free online tools remove native protections in seconds

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.heading: Ideal for those who live off Excel
useCases.subtitle: Professionals who invest time creating valuable solutions can't afford to see them copied.
useCases.consultantsDesc: Send valuation models and analyses to clients without exposing your proprietary methodology.
useCases.sellersDesc: Distribute spreadsheets on Hotmart/Gumroad safely. Your clients use, but don't copy.
useCases.teamsDesc: Protect internal tools before sharing with external teams or contractors.

dashboard.title: Spreadsheet Blocker
dashboard.subtitle: Select an Excel file (.xlsm), start processing, and track the status in the log.

errors.invalidMimeTypeDesc: The selected file does not look like an Excel .xlsm.
errors.invalidSignatureDesc: The file does not contain a valid Excel (.xlsm) signature.
